ExampleCommand.ABOUT: The ABOUT field is required in all commands and should describe that command and its fields.

SomeMessage.comment: This comment is for the SomeMessage variable. The SomeMessage variable is an example of a string

Count.comment: This comment is for the Count variable which is an example of an int

SomeBooleanExample.comment: This comment is for the SomeBooleanExample

CouldBeNothing.comment: This comment is for the CouldBeNothing. This is an example of an optional parameter.

AnotherExampleCommand.ABOUT: This command just shows you how to put a second command into the generator json
